home_items.title: Let's create an image
home_items.hint: Describe the image to me here

home_professions.title: Translate anything
home_professions.body_message: What would you like to translate?

home_professions.title: Write me a poem
home_professions.body_message: Select a type of poem you would like, also tell me what you would like it to be about and in which tone.

home_professions.title: Solve a problem
home_professions.body_message: What is your problem you would like me to solve?

home_professions.title: Correct text
home_professions.body_message: What would you like to be corrected?

home_professions.title: Write an email
home_professions.body_message: What would you like the main point of the email to be, is this directed to a specific person or a group, and what kind of emotions would you like to portray?
home_professions.system_prompt: You are a professional administrative assistant.

home_professions.title: Summarize text
home_professions.body_message: What would you like me to summarize?
home_professions.system_prompt: You are a specialist in summarizing text.
